DESCRIPTION: Burn your cards to obtain "Crystals" and "Silver" which can be used to either craft "Cubes" or purchase various "Items" in the Bot. Using the command "sb" just by itself will attempt to burn your most recent card
GUILDSTONE_BURN: You are about to burn a `Guild Stone`
GUILDSTONE_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} You do not have a `Guild Stone`
BURN_FRAG_WARN:
You are about to burn a `Fragment`
`Fragment` Code: `{{fragCode}}`
CARD_NOT_OWNED: You do not own that card
